Louisville/Jefferson County, KY Metro > Shepherdsville > Restaurants > Kfc Kfc (502) 543-4617 427 Highway 44 E , Shepherdsville , KY | Directions 40165 37.990100 -85.711800 View Website Share Save Own this Business? Thumbs Up Thumbs Down ? not rated yet Add a Photo Cuisine: Fast Food , Traditional American , Chicken Price: $ Categories: Restaurants View More Restaurant Special Features: Cheap Eats , Carry Out , Family-Friendly Dining , Lunch Spot Payment Methods: MasterCard, Visa View Less Site Feedback Overview Tips (2) Photos (0) Write a Tip for Kfc Sign in to Write a Tip Write a Tip... optional
Tips for Kfc Doesn't Recommend truckbrandon Joined 4 years ago 2.0 January 27, 2009 Food Fresh, Expect Longer than normal wait times. The food here has been good every time. The problem is that they never get the order right. ALWAYS check your bag thoroughly before pulling off from these guys. Be prepared to wait, as they will seem to take forever to get your food to you. … View More View Less 0 Heart Doesn't Recommend Contributor Joined 9 years ago January 15, 2008 For more than 60 years, this all-American institution has been serving its signature chicken and home-style sides.. In Short Established in 1939, this fast-food restaurant still makes its legendary fried chicken with the closely guarded blend of 11 herbs and spices originally created by founder Colonel Sanders. Modern additions to the menu include oven-roasted renditions of its chicken sandwiches, popcorn chicken, potato wedges and wraps. Classic sides include flaky, oversized biscuits, steaming-hot mashed potatoes and gravy, smoky-sweet baked beans and crisp, generously dressed coleslaw. Kids and adults love the "little bucket" parfaits of pudding desserts. … View More View Less 0 Heart
